text:
West 128th Street, west from Convent Avenue. To the left center is a space (details in views 2 and 3) where a boiler of this brewery exploded and caused extensive damage recently. G.W. Bromley's atlas of 1922 gives the owner of same as the Bernheimer and Schwartz Pilsener Brewing Company. Note the cat walk connecting building units on opposite sides of the street.

April 1, 1938.
Views 1,2 and 3

P. L. Sperr
